item.title: Adani Green Energy Ltd Gains 14.05%: 6 Key Factors Driving the Week’s Volatility
item.description: Adani Green Energy Ltd delivered a strong weekly performance, rising 14.05% from Rs.851.85 to Rs.971.55 between 2 and 6 February 2026, significantly outperforming the Sensex’s 1.51% gain over the same period. The stock exhibited notable intraday volatility and a series of sharp rebounds following earlier declines, reflecting a complex interplay of technical shifts, market sentiment, and sector dynamics. Time: 2 minutes ago

item.title: Parvati Sweetners Declines 6.36% Amid Mixed Technicals and Weak Financials
item.description: Parvati Sweetners and Power Ltd experienced a turbulent week, closing at Rs.8.83 on 6 February 2026, down 6.36% from the previous Friday’s close of Rs.9.43. This decline contrasted with the Sensex’s 1.51% gain over the same period, highlighting the stock’s underperformance amid mixed technical signals and weak financial fundamentals. The week was marked by a notable Golden Cross formation on 3 February, signalling potential bullish momentum, followed by a downgrade in the company’s rating to Sell, reflecting persistent operational challenges.
